content:
does anyone see anything wrong with this query:

http://tx.fhir.org/r4/ConceptMap/$translate?url=http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/cm-administrative-gender-v2&system=http://hl7.org/fhir/administrative-gender&code=male&source=http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/administrative-gender&target=http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0001

It simply returns an empty parameter...
I could swear this worked some time ago, but maybe I'm doing it wrong...?

The server does know the ConceptMap with the corresponding source and target:
http://tx.fhir.org/r4/ConceptMap?url=http://hl7.org/fhir/ConceptMap/cm-administrative-gender-v2

...but still...

Ok, I get the same result when I run the example from the FHIR Spec:
http://tx.fhir.org/r4/ConceptMap/$translate?system=http://hl7.org/fhir/composition-status&code=preliminary&source=http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/composition-status&target=http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ActStatus

...so it's probably not me...
